definition: to boil/to roll/to take a hike/Get lost!
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to roll/(to do sth) in a loop/to scroll (computing)/to progressively expand (economics)/to rumble (of thunder)
to go through challenging experiences/to become seasoned (in one's profession etc)
to boil (of liquid)/boiling hot/Get out!/Go away!/fuck off (rude)

sentences.english: Put the small balls into the boiling water until they become flowing.
sentences.chinese: 把搓好的小丸子放入滾水中煮滾及浮起。

sentences.english: Small stones rolled down the hillside as they ran up.
sentences.chinese: 他們跑上山坡，同時有些小石子滾了下來。

sentences.english: The stone rolled down the mountain by gravity.
sentences.chinese: 這塊石頭由於重力作用而滾下山。

sentences.english: When rolling down the hill, he snatched at a rock.
sentences.chinese: 在向山下滾的過程中，他一把抓住了一塊岩石。

sentences.english: then the circle slides in from the left to the right.
Stir in broth and bay leaves, heat to boiling.
sentences.chinese: 加入菜湯和桂葉，加熱至滾。

sentences.english: Pancake rolled along, looking for a place to hide.
sentences.chinese: 煎餅一直滾，找一個地方藏起來。

sentences.english: The ball connected with the smaller end of the bat and grounded toward second base.
sentences.chinese: 球撞到了球棒的細端，然後向二壘滾去。

sentences.english: The tin can bounced down the steps.
sentences.chinese: 那聽子一路顛跳着滾下了臺階。

sentences.english: The ball went bouncing down the stairs.
Rinse fresh lotus seeds, soak in hot water until soft, remove piths .
sentences.chinese: 鮮蓮子沖水，加入滾水浸至軟身，去芯。

sentences.english: When I saw this tree, I wanted to kick it out of the door and down the street.
sentences.chinese: 我一看到這棵樹，就恨不得把它踹出門滾到大街上。

sentences.english: Lastly add in assam juice and bring to boil.
sentences.chinese: 最後加入阿叄水煮滾即可。

sentences.english: He rolled on the ground and stood up.
sentences.chinese: 他在地上打了個滾，站了起來。

sentences.english: I will leave It In the prisoners' showers. Now go, and reveal nothing of this.
sentences.chinese: 我會把它留在囚犯澡堂，現在滾吧，別泄漏出去。

sentences.english: A new process of barrel Ni-Fe alloy plating was developed.
sentences.chinese: 研製出一種滾鍍鎳鐵合金新工藝。

definition: a moment/a while/in a moment/also pr. [yi1 hui3]
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
top (of the head)/apex/to fall forwards/inverted/to jolt
noisy/cacophonous/to make noise/to disturb/to vent (feelings)/to fall ill/to have an attack (of sickness)/to go in (for some activity)/to joke
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
to play/to have fun/to hang out
(of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
to soar/to gallop/to prance/to turn over/to vacate/to clear
